channel.title: Change
channel.description:
There have been many attempts and failures to 'fix' moparscape, but then i thought why. All these people had common problems, they failed to admit that they too were the problem and they also expected others to change the community for them. No more of that.
[b][size=14pt]Moparscape Community Server[/size][/b]
Moparscape community server is going to be a true 317 public project that will be made by any members of the community. To get in the project you will need to test in; everyone must take the test and anyone can take it. The server will be released and updated once a month.
There are three benefits for this project:
[ul][li]Bring back FUN 317's where people could use commands such as 317[/li] [li]Provide well made sources for newcomers[/li] [li]Allow members to work together to make something[/li][/ul]
We will make a official thread for the project soon
[b][size=14pt]Moparscapers' not getting help[/size][/b]
The biggest problem our community has is the lack of interest to learn. If you are reading this topic and are someone who needs help a lot PM me or someone else to help you, the reason you never get help in the help section is the fact that
1. Not much help can be provided via Forums 2. We can't understand your problems usually 3. We never visit the help section
Please do not come to IRC for help, you will not find it there.
[b][size=14pt]Moparscape Flaming[/size][/b]
This is the internet, people COME here to flame and release their stress from their everyday lives. If something someone says bothers you, just leave and ignore them. There are well over 1000 other members here that would be glad to talk to you.

We need more people like TOMSCAPE BETA.

item.title: Change
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

The flaming has gotten pretty bad I agree. 317 Servers to be fun? Ya I guess, but people are now focused on being the best and being able to put 508 graphics on a 317. There should be a bigger rule on LOOKING AT THE HELP SECTION. Not that hard to look there or search bar first. Lack of interest to learn. I think this can be improved. Maybe put a different method to learning? I don’t know how just shooting ideas. Well mad sources for new comers? Ya definately, they try to download really coded sources expecting to know how to code right then and there. I obviously think that Si Force is bringing back the fun 317 with his Trible Isle server, but ya know. This project could very well help Moparscape and hurt at the same time. I think this will happen, but not soon. It will take a while to pull it together.

Read full topic

item.title: Change
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Our community has stability, which a lot of other community’s lack. There is nothing wrong with what it is now, and it won’t ever change. To be honest I really could care less if it changed because I enjoy coming to these forums and posting just like a lot of other people do. As for the server, meh.

Read full topic
